column4: Does anybody else experience problems with the titles of windows? It doesn't seem to update itself...
For example, in Firefox, if you browse to another site, it still has the title of your homepage
and after saving a LibreOffice document, it remains as Untitled 1
with unity the top panel is interwined with the window open and the OS click on the FF window then the top panel. With libreoffice name it.
